issue.title: No Rear SA Camera Frame In URDF

content.raw:
Yes, confirmed missing.  We'll be adding a new camera with following specs from the hardware:

The camera focal point location in the UTORSO link frame is approximately:

~~~
X:  -2.6mm
Y:  26.4mm
Z:  664.9mm
~~~

With focal axis pointing along the -X direction of the UTORSO link frame (Y-left and Z-up).

The camera is a [D-Link DCS-2310L camera](http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/view/network-cameras/dcs-2310l-outdoor-hd-poe-day-night-cloud-camera).
content.html:
Yes, confirmed missing. We'll be adding a new camera with following specs from the hardware:

The camera focal point location in the UTORSO link frame is approximately:

Y:  26.4mm
Z:  664.9mm

With focal axis pointing along the -X direction of the UTORSO link frame (Y-left and Z-up).

The camera is a D-Link DCS-2310L camera.
